item.title: parties
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Wizardry 8 Parties Party Number ONE - 31 July 2003 Party Number TWO - 04 June 2004 Party Number THREE - 21 January 2005 Remember, You’ll need something like 7zip to extract the file… Party Numer ONE - 31 July 2003 Attitude: This was probably the easiest char I’ve ever played in wizardry 8… And he’s quite boring too. Well they are excellent professions early & mid-game those fighters, but tend to be very boring late-game because everything is maxed.
